/usr/bin/c++   -g    CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/events.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/gl_objects.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/avatar.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/sdlglutils.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/surface.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/sensor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/Avatar.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o Avatar  -L/home/rhoo/AppRep/Avatar/lib -rdynamic -Wl,-Bstatic -lSDLmain -Wl,-Bdynamic -lSDL -lpthread -lSDL_image -lGLU -lGLEW -lGL -lglut -lOpenNI2 -Wl,-rpath,/home/rhoo/AppRep/Avatar/lib
